DOC.brief_summary: Hypothesis: The immunogenicity of oral polio vaccine (OPV) will be enhanced in Bangladeshi infants who receive bicarbonate buffer at the time of polio immunization.
DOC.brief_title: Evaluation of Buffer on Immune Response to Oral Polio Vaccine (OPV) in Bangladesh
DOC.detailed_description: The investigators will conduct a study to evaluate the impact of administering bicarbonate buffer on the serologic responses to oral polio vaccine (OPV) in Bangladeshi infants.
DOC.criteria: infants who are 48 weeks old residents of study area received a blood transfusion or any other blood product (such as immune globulin) likely to move out of study area within the next four months currently enrolled or planning to enroll in another study major congenital malformations neurologic disorders immunodeficiency
